name: Page Load Validation
description: Verify the main page loads correctly
steps: Wait for page to fully load
expected_result: Page loads without errors and displays calculator buttons

name: Button Functionality: Basic Arithmetic
expected_result: Correct results are displayed for each operation

name: Button Functionality: Zero
expected_result: Zero is displayed correctly and functions in calculations

name: Button Functionality: Clear Button
description: Verify the 'C' button clears the display

name: Layout Validation
description: Verify the layout of the calculator
steps: Observe the arrangement of buttons and display
expected_result: Buttons and display are arranged logically and neatly

name: Responsiveness
description: Check if the calculator is responsive on different screen sizes
steps: Resize the browser window to different sizes
expected_result: Calculator layout adapts well to different screen sizes

name: Division by Zero
description: Test the handling of division by zero
expected_result: Appropriate error message is displayed (e.g., 'Division by zero')

name: Invalid Input
description: Test the handling of invalid input (e.g., letters)
expected_result: Invalid input is ignored or handled appropriately (e.g., no response, error message)

name: Large Number Calculation
expected_result: Calculates correctly or indicates overflow if it exceeds the limit

name: Keyboard Navigation
steps: Use keyboard to interact with calculator buttons
expected_result: All buttons are accessible and functional via keyboard

name: Screen Reader Compatibility
steps: Test with a screen reader (e.g., JAWS, NVDA)
expected_result: Screen reader correctly announces buttons and results

name: Page Load Time
description: Measure the time it takes for the page to load
steps: Use browser developer tools to measure page load time
expected_result: Page load time is within acceptable limits (e.g., < 2 seconds)

name: Calculation Response Time
description: Measure the time it takes for calculations to complete
steps: Perform several complex calculations and measure response times
expected_result: Calculation response time is within acceptable limits

name: XSS Prevention
steps: Attempt to inject malicious scripts into input fields
expected_result: Malicious scripts are not executed; the application correctly handles and sanitizes inputs.

name: Consecutive Operations
expected_result: Correct result according to order of operations (PEMDAS/BODMAS)

name: Decimal Numbers
expected_result: Correct results are displayed for decimal calculations
